entry.title: ST15 Royal Purple - EasyWeed® Stretch HTV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 3.00 - 51.00 (4 variants)

The most trusted heat transfer vinyl brand in the world brings you flexible style for performance wear and more!

EasyWeed Stretch by Siser delivers all the benefits of our EasyWeed heat transfer material and combines it with super stretchability to create one remarkable heat transfer material! The thinnest of any Siser material, EasyWeed Stretch has an ultra-matte finish and a soft hand. While EasyWeed Stretch is ideal for performance apparel, the soft hand and light weight often make it a favourite for other garment decorating.

EasyWeed Stretch is CPSIA Certified, so it’s safe on garments for all ages!.

 

Application Instructions (heat press)

• Mirror your image when cutting
• Weed excess material
• Preheat garment for 2-3 seconds
• Apply design at 320°F/160°C
• Use FIRM pressure for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

Firm pressure

Application instructions (home iron)

• Set iron dial between Cotton and Linen
• Cover design with parchment paper or non-stick cover sheet
• Place on flat, hard surface (ironing board not recommended)
• Press iron with FIRM pressure (do not slide iron)
• Press each section of design for 20 seconds
• If areas of design lift after application, replace cover sheet
and re-press for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

EasyWeed Applies to:

  • 100% cotton
  • Poly/cotton blends
  • 100% polyester
  • Leather
  • Lycra/Spandex

Laundering:

• Wait 24 hours before 1st wash
• Machine wash warm or cold/mild detergent
• Dry on normal dryer setting
• Do not dry clean

Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 85.05 - 207.00 (2 variants)

Save 10% when you choose a bundle!

This bundle is a great way to start your collection or add to it.

It includes one of every colour of the following (all the stretch colours):

ST01 – White

ST02 – Black

ST03 – Royal Blue

ST04 – Navy

ST05 – Red

ST06 – Yellow

ST07 – Green

ST08 – Orange

ST12 – Gold

ST13 – Silver

ST28 – Sun Yellow

ST44 – Rose Gold

ST55 – Bright Red

ST62 – Lilac

ST86 – Passion Pink

ST87 – Coral

ST88 – Sea Glass

ST89 – Sweet Mint

ST90 – Purple Berry

ST91 – Ballerina

ST92 – Chestnut

We reserve the right to substitute any out of stock colours. Out of stock colours will be substituted with Black or White. In the event that we have more than 2 colours out of stock at the time of your order, we will contact you so you can make your substitution choices.

• Weed excess material
• Preheat garment for 2-3 seconds
• Apply design at 320°F/160°C
• Use FIRM pressure for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

Firm pressure

Application instructions (home iron)

• Set iron dial between Cotton and Linen
• Cover design with parchment paper or non-stick cover sheet
• Place on flat, hard surface (ironing board not recommended)
• Press iron with FIRM pressure (do not slide iron)
• Press each section of design for 20 seconds
• If areas of design lift after application, replace cover sheet
and re-press for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

EasyWeed Applies to:

  • 100% cotton
  • Poly/cotton blends
  • 100% polyester
  • Leather
  • Lycra/Spandex

Laundering:

• Wait 24 hours before 1st wash
• Machine wash warm or cold/mild detergent
• Dry on normal dryer setting
• Do not dry clean

entry.title: ST88 Sea Glass - EasyWeed® Stretch HTV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 3.00 - 51.00 (4 variants)

The most trusted heat transfer vinyl brand in the world brings you flexible style for performance wear and more

EasyWeed Stretch by Siser delivers all the benefits of our EasyWeed heat transfer material and combines it with super stretchability to create one remarkable heat transfer material! The thinnest of any Siser material, EasyWeed Stretch has an ultra-matte finish and a soft hand. While EasyWeed Stretch is ideal for performance apparel, the soft hand and light weight often make it a favourite for other garment decorating.

EasyWeed Stretch is CPSIA Certified, so it’s safe on garments for all ages!.

Application Instructions (heat press)

• Mirror your image when cutting
• Weed excess material
• Preheat garment for 2-3 seconds
• Apply design at 320°F/160°C
• Use FIRM pressure for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

• If areas of design lift after application, replace cover sheet
and re-press for 20 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

  • 100% cotton

  • Leather
  • Lycra/Spandex
